definition: the deliberate, systematic, or wanton infliction of physical or mental suffering by one or more persons in an attempt to force another person to yield information or to make a confession or for any other reason, subject to torture
details:
noun
- the deliberate, systematic, or wanton infliction of physical or mental suffering by one or more persons in an attempt to force another person to yield information or to make a confession or for any other reason
= synonyms: torturing
- the act of distorting something so it seems to mean something it was not intended to mean
= synonyms: overrefinement
- intense feelings of suffering
= synonyms: torment
- extreme mental distress
= synonyms: torment
- unbearable physical pain
= synonyms: torment
verb
- subject to torture
= synonyms: excruciate, torment
- torment emotionally or mentally
= synonyms: rack
